title: Indonesia Set to Revamp Benchmark Rates for Money Market
description: Indonesia is set to phase out a key money-market benchmark this week, concluding a years-long transition to align with global standards.
content: Indonesia is set to phase out a key money-market benchmark this week, concluding a years-long transition to align with global standards.
